instruction: Fatigue for the last couple of weeks, waking up a lot at night, not feeling rested, slight weight loss, lightheadedness when standing up, stopped taking iron supplements due to stomach upset.

attributes.narrative: Fatigue for the last couple of weeks, waking up a lot at night, not feeling rested, slight weight loss, lightheadedness when standing up, stopped taking iron supplements due to stomach upset.

attributes.comment: To assess iron levels, thyroid function, and B12 status.
